name: Viki Spotter: Undersea
description:
Do you have the courage to dive to the bottom of the sea? To take such a decision is not so simple, because who knows what you will see there, under the water column.But brave Viki for the umpteenth time, without any hesitation, decided on a new adventure. Will you follow her or stay on shore?

Features:
- Charming main character
- Develops attention
- The variety of marine life
- A lot of Steam achievements
- Support for all platforms (Windows, Mac, Linux, SteamOS)

Do you know who lives at the bottom of the ocean? Viki, for example, has long dreamed of swim with scuba and explore the depths of the sea. She is, of course, most likely the most desperate person you've ever met, but even such a determined girl sometimes needs help and friendly advice. You have to make a fascinating underwater adventure and help Viki deal with a lot of impressive, colorful pictures, between which you will need to find all possible differences. Waiting for you: grinning seals, chests with treasures, safely hidden in the sea depths, fish of all shapes and colors, coral polyps and much more!
